Title: Directs the department of financial services to study health insurance coverage through the Marketplace
Summary: Directs the department of financial services to study health insurance coverage through the Marketplace, including collecting data on how many people are insured, and studying the feasibility of creating programs, subsidies, and/or tax credits to help expand health care coverage.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the department of financial services to study health insurance coverage through the Marketplace
